question: Which country was the location of the "Patriotic War of the People of Abkhazia"?
explanation: The War in Abkhazia (also known by Abkhazia as the Patriotic War of the People of Abkhazia) was fought in the Abkhazia region of western Georgia between Georgian government forces for the most part and Abkhaz separatist forces, Russian government armed forces and North Caucasian militants between 1992 and 1993. This war resulted in the Abkhazian-North Caucasian victory. Abkhazia becomes a de facto independent republic but remains internationally recognized as part of Georgia. Ethnic cleansing of Georgians in Abkhazia. Georgia was forced to join the Commonwealth of Independent States.
